name: Multi-Agent SDLC
description: Orchestrates ADD, BDD, and Coder agents for end-to-end development. Demonstrates hierarchical composition (Remark 5) where each generator may be an autonomous Semantic Agent.
specification: Build a feature based on the provided requirements and architecture documentation.

g_config.description: Extract project configuration (source_root, package_name) from documentation

g_add.description: Generate pytest-arch tests from architecture documentation

g_coder.description: Generate implementation that satisfies all tests and scenarios
